channel.title: sakura on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in sakura on Barefoot Rob

item.title: replanted tree today
item.description: 18:18 Saturday 15 June 2019 JST Lin and I replanted the sakura tree which we planted (too close to the wall) last week. There was a slight gap in the rain so we took the chance to move the tree. I was thankful I had done a careful job of packing mud and nutritious leaves for the tree last week. I was able to dig those up and reuse them today.

item.title: chillin with Travis and them
item.description: 17:39 Tuesday 30 April 2019 JST Today Lin and I drove to Travis and Yumi’s place to hang out with them and Sakura. Johan was already there and Deji came a bit later. Nice to see everyone again, though in some ways it’s like the tribe is getting smaller (and larger!) No BBQ today due to rain, but we made 手巻き with chicken, eggs, salad, and then ice cream at the end.

item.title: SOGO me too
item.description: 12:31 Monday 16 September 2018 JST Funny thing at SOGO today. Sakura asked me how long I’ve been in Japan. 15 years. She goes “Wow, me too, almost.” She is 17 years old. hahaha
